Plot: Summertime. A cruising spot for men, tucked away on the shores of a lake. Franck falls in love with Michel, an attractive, potent and lethally dangerous man. Franck knows this but wants to live out his passion anyway.
Title: Stranger by the Lake
Actors: Pierre Deladonchamps, Christophe Paou, Patrick d'Assumçao, Jérôme Chappatte
tomatoConsensus: Sexy, smart, and darkly humorous, Stranger by the Lake offers rewarding viewing for adult filmgoers in search of thought-provoking drama.
